xt:extension.xt:author: Syncro Soft
xt:extension.xt:name: DITA Prolog Updater

div.p: This add-on contributes a preferences page that includes various options for updating the "prolog" section of a DITA topic/map.

ul.li: Critical/Security: The add-on no longer distributes log4j libraries to avoid the Log4Shell exploit. For more info see: CVE-2021-44228.
Fixed an issue where a 'contributor' author was inserted instead of a 'creator' author for newly created documents that have whitespaces in the path.

ol.li: Added a new option to customize the value of the type attribute for the author element that is inserted to allow you to specify the primary (creator) author. #20
Added a new option to customize the value of the type attribute for the author element that is inserted to allow you to specify an additional author (contributor). #20
Improved the process so that an additional author (contributor) cannot be added if they are already specified as the primary (creator) author. #21
Fixed an issue where a warning message was reported even though prolog updating was disabled. #15
